    This class simulates a player

    • Method Detail

      • randomAnimal

        public Animal randomAnimal()
        Returns:
        a random animal for player to select his cards

      • addToCompleteList

        public void addToCompleteList()
        Adds a card to fill complete list with 30 cards It guarantees no animal is generated more than 5 cards with heckNumberOfAnimals method

      • addToSelectedList

        public void addToSelectedList(Animal animal)
        Parameters:
        animal - animal is selected to fill player's 10 cards

      • checkNumberOfAnimals

        public boolean checkNumberOfAnimals(Animal animal)
        Parameters:
        animal - animal that is generated randomly and we want to make sure is not generated more than 5 times for complete 30 cards
        Returns:
        true: Isn't generated 5 or more than 5 cards | false: is generated 5 or more cards of this same animal

      • checkSPforAttack

        public boolean checkSPforAttack(int damage,
                                int attackerIndex)
        Parameters:
        damage - The damage that attacker wants to deal
        attackerIndex - attacker's index in the selected cards of player
        Returns:
        true: Has enough SP for attack | false: doesn't have enough SP for attack

      • printSelectedCards

        public void printSelectedCards()
        Prints selected cards of the player

      • addToWarParty

        public boolean addToWarParty(int index,
                             java.lang.String attackType)
        adds a card from selection to war party
        Parameters:
        index - animal's index in the selection
        attackType - Attack type (Primary or secondary)
        Returns:
        true: added successfully | false: cannot be added

      • disbandParty

        public boolean disbandParty()
        Disbands party and returns party members to selection collection
        Returns:
        true: party disbanded successfully | false: party cannot be disbanded (normally not gonna happen...)

      • selectRandomCardsForSelection

        public void selectRandomCardsForSelection()
        Selects 10 random cards for the A.I player

      • canBeAddedtoWarParty

        public boolean canBeAddedtoWarParty(Animal animal,
                                    java.lang.String partyLeaderAttackType)
        Tells that whether selected animal can be added to war party or not
        Parameters:
        animal - animal we want to add to the war party
        partyLeaderAttackType - party leader's attack type (i.e. bite? wound? kill? ...)
        Returns:
        ture: selected animal can be added to war party | false: selected animal can't be added to war party because it doesn't have an attack type same as party leader

      • randomLeaderIndex

        public int randomLeaderIndex()
        Generates a random index from player's selection
        Returns:
        a random index from player's selection

      • restoreSPforAI

        public int restoreSPforAI()
        Returns the index of animal in A.I's selection for restoring SP
        Returns:
        random index of animal in A.I's selection for restoring SP
